attributes.action: A J walking law in central london
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the busy roads of london.i think there should be a j walking law just in cental london,too many people are getting hurt and even killed!
This needs to stop and so i feel we should intoduce this law to try and prevent more injuries,deaths..pls sign if you agree.thank you for your time.
